heading: Tonight
text: Becoming mostly cloudy, as steady rain and showers increase, spreading east overnight. Lows from the upper 40s to mid 50s in the Champlain Valley. Southeast wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting up to 30 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Monday
text: Heavy widespread rain early, chance of a rumble of thunder mainly south and west of I-89. Rain lets up around noon before a second round of lighter showers in the afternoon. Highs in the low to mid 60s. Southeast winds between 15 to 25, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Monday Night
text: Rain and showers becoming more scattered after midnight. Lows in the 40s, nearing 50 along Lake Champlain. Wind diminishing to light and variable.
